issue.title: TypeError: nextDialog is not a function
issue.body:
**Describe the bug**
When I tested my chatBot, the error as the title says showed up on the terminal. Is there anything I did wrong? I would be thankful to you  if you could provide me with the solution to deal the problem.

`TypeError: nextDialog is not a function
    at n/ode_modules/bottender/dist/bot/Bot.js:37:32
    at Generator.next (<anonymous>)
    at /node_modules/bottender/dist/bot/Bot.js:8:71
    at new Promise (<anonymous>)
    at __awaiter (/node_modules/bottender/dist/bot/Bot.js:4:12)
    at Run (/node_modules/bottender/dist/bot/Bot.js:34:16)
    at /node_modules/bottender/dist/bot/Bot.js:158:41
`

issue.title: Node inspection debug
issue.body:
Is there a possibility to have a wrapper or something similar for node inspection flag (--inspect=HOST:PORT), so that it would be possibile to attach a debugger? 
This was possible in previous versions directly launching node.

payload.description: ⚡️ A framework for building conversational user interfaces.

issue.title: Node inspection debug
issue.body:
Is there a possibility to have a wrapper or something similar for node inspection flag (--inspect=HOST:PORT), so that it would be possibile to attach a debugger? 
This was possible in previous versions directly launching node.

comment.body:
You can use
```
NODE_OPTIONS='--inspect=HOST:PORT' bottender start`
```
to enable node debugger.

However, for `bottender dev`, there's a problem on nodemon watch so inspect is not available on dev mode, we're currently fixing that.

commits.message: docs(README): replace broadcast with persona because broadcast is deprecated

**Describe the bug**
When I tested my chatBot, the error as the title says showed up on the terminal. Is there anything I did wrong? I would be thankful to you  if you could provide me with the solution to deal the problem.

`TypeError: nextDialog is not a function

    at Generator.next (<anonymous>)

    at Run (/node_modules/bottender/dist/bot/Bot.js:34:16)
    at /node_modules/bottender/dist/bot/Bot.js:158:41
`
